title: Hybrid Low-Resource TTS Dataset Synthesis Pipeline
description: Complete pipeline implementing the whitepaper workflow: Format Conversion → Denoising → Trimming → Normalization → WPM Filtering → Voice Cloning for creating high-quality TTS datasets.

title: Arabic Diacritization with LSTM
description: Train a small LSTM model to predict Arabic diacritics, export to ONNX format, and benchmark performance for real-time text processing.

title: OVOS Multilingual Intent Classifier with Model2Vec
description: Train a multilingual intent classifier for OVOS skills using Model2Vec embeddings. Supports 11+ languages with ONNX export for efficient deployment.

title: Wake Word Dataset Generation & Augmentation Pipeline
description: End-to-end pipeline for generating, augmenting, and benchmarking wake-word datasets using TTS synthesis, voice conversion, adversarial generation, and acoustic augmentation.
